name: micro-frontend-comparison
description: A comparison of different micro-frontend solutions

scripts.dev:qiankun: pnpm --filter qiankun-app-main run dev & pnpm --filter shared-vue-app run dev:qiankun
scripts.dev:micro-app: pnpm --filter micro-app-main run dev & pnpm --filter shared-vue-app run dev:micro-app
scripts.dev:wujie: pnpm --filter wujie-app-main run dev & pnpm --filter shared-vue-app run dev:wujie
scripts.dev:garfish: pnpm --filter garfish-app-main run dev & pnpm --filter shared-vue-app run dev:garfish
scripts.build:qiankun: pnpm --filter shared-vue-app run build:qiankun && pnpm --filter qiankun-app-main run build
scripts.build:micro-app: pnpm --filter shared-vue-app run build:micro-app && pnpm --filter micro-app-main run build
scripts.build:wujie: pnpm --filter shared-vue-app run build:wujie && pnpm --filter wujie-app-main run build
scripts.build:garfish: pnpm --filter shared-vue-app run build:garfish && pnpm --filter garfish-app-main run build
scripts.build: pnpm run build:qiankun && pnpm run build:micro-app && pnpm run build:wujie && pnpm run build:garfish
